settings.footer_about_text:
Dr. Thrower's Skin & Hair Care products are specifically created for ethnic skin and by skin type to make sure treatment is effective.

Our  product line covers a range of solutions for ethnic skin including acne, dark spots, hyperpigmentation, skin discoloration, eczema and more.

Got questions about whether our products are for you? Ask us through our chat!

settings.title: How To Use
settings.tab_content: Use this exfoliating facial scrub twice a week, or as needed. Use after our Oily Skin Facial Cleanser and apply to your wet face, gently massaging your skin. Rinse off the exfoliating facial scrub with warm water and pat your skin dry. Next, apply our Oily Skin Facial Astringent before moisturizing to finish.

settings.title: Ingredients
settings.tab_content:
This exfoliating facial scrub has lots of natural, skin-clearing ingredients. These include cranberry seeds, eucalyptus oil and aloe gel.
Eucalyptus - this is a wonderful skincare ingredient. It is anti-inflammatory and an antioxidant and it is also a natural antiseptic that helps skin heal. What’s more, eucalyptus has natural antibacterial properties
Cranberry seeds – these are small seeds that are excellent gentle exfoliators
Aloe gel – this contains enzymes, antioxidants and Vitamins C and A. It is a natural anti-inflammatory and can help to treat acne and skin irritations.

settings.title: Warnings
settings.tab_content: Do not use on the same day as the facial mask.

settings.title: Benefits
settings.tab_content:
A combination of shea butter and chamomile cleanse your face without getting rid of any natural healthy oils, while aloe vera provides soothing qualities that are great for reducing redness and darker skin caused by sun damage and acne. 

•  Revitalizes and nourishes skin.

•  Minimizes acne scarring/reduces the appearance of skin discoloration.

•  Helps to normalize skin oil production, creating a healthy balance.

settings.title: How To Use
settings.tab_content:
Routine steps for normal/combination skin :

Morning

Step 1- Cleanser
Gently rinse your face with warm water, then apply Step 1 Normal/Combination Skin Facial Cleanser. Massage it into your skin, being careful not to get it in your eyes or mouth. Rinse your face with warm water and pat dry.

Step 2- Toner
Apply the Normal/Combination Skin Facial Toner to a cotton ball or skin pad and gently wipe the cotton ball across your face and neck, taking care not to get it in your eyes and avoid the mouth area. Let the toner dry on your face.

Step 3- Moisturizer
Apply the SPF 30 Face & Body Moisturizing Lotion every morning.

Nighttime

Step 1- Cleanser.

Step 2 - Normal/Combination Facial Scrub OR Normal/Combination Facial Mask
Use the Normal/Combination Facial Scrub and the Normal/Dry Skin Facial Mask twice a week at night, as needed. Make sure you don’t use these on the same day.

Step 3- Toner.

Step 4- Moisturizer.
Lastly, apply the Aloe Facial Moisturizing Cream to face and neck.

Each product is numbered, so you know exactly in which order to apply them. For further instructions about each specific product(such as how often you should be using it, how to apply it), check the individual label.

settings.title: FAQ
settings.tab_content:
What kind of skin type is this kit best suited for?
These products are to improve and maintain healthy normal/combination skin as they help to provide all of the nutrients that your skin requires.

Can people with sensitive skin use these products?
Yes, these products are designed to be safely used on any skin, including sensitive skin.

Can I use the SPF 30 Moisturizing Lotion on my face?
Yes, the SPF 30 Moisturizing Lotion is designed to provide protection from the sun on both your face and body.

How often should I be using these products?
You should be using the facial cleanser, toner and moisturizer twice a day (day and night). Use the facial scrub and mask twice a week, or as needed. Use the SPF 30 Moisturizing Lotion in the morning and Aloe Moisturizing Cream at night.

settings.title: Benefits
settings.tab_content:
Jojoba oil helps to moisturize, while also reducing the amount of sebum (natural oil)that is produced, rebalancing your skin to a healthy state. Eucalyptus and peppermint oil are present, helping to disinfect and reduce the presence of blemishes safely, so that they don’t scar. Benefits include:

•  Gently exfoliates oily dead skin cells

•  Disinfects skin, reducing blemishes

•  Reduces acne caused by excessive oil production

settings.title: How To Use
settings.tab_content:
After step 1, wet your face, and gently massage the scrub into your skin. Rinse your face with warm water, and then pat dry. Use this product twice a week, or as needed.

For the best results we recommend this skincare routine:

Morning

Step 1- Cleanser: first, wash your face with the Oily Skin Facial Cleanser.

Step 2- Toner/Astringent: gently wipe the Oily Facial Astringent with a cotton ball across your face avoiding the eyes and mouth area.

Step 4- Moisturize: apply the SPF 30 Face& Body Moisturizing Lotion.

Nighttime

Step 1- Cleanser: first, wash your face with the Oily Skin Facial Cleanser.

Scrub or Mask: use the Oily Skin Facial Scrub Or the Oily Skin Mask on separate nights.

Step 2 Astringent: gently apply the toner with a cotton ball across your face. Avoid the eye and mouth area.

Step 3- Aloe Facial Moisturizing Cream.

settings.tab_content: Water, Vaccinium Macrocarpon (Cranberry), Seed Powder Jojoba Esters, Tapioca Starch, Polysorbate 20, GI cerin, Quercus Alba Bark Extract, Tocopherol, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract, Retinyl Palmitate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Ascorbic Acid, Pyridoxine HCI, Silica, Lactobacillus/Papaya Fruit Ferment, Extract Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Oil, Eucalyptus Globulus Leaf Oil, Etbylhexylglycerin, Benzyl Alcohol, Carbomer, Aminomethyl Propane!, PEG-8 Dimethicone, Octy ldodecanol, Sodium Propoxyhydroxypropyl, Thiosulfate Silica.

settings.title: FAQ
settings.tab_content:
How often should I use this product?
For maximum results, we recommend that you use this product twice a week (or as needed).

Is it safe for sensitive skin?
Yes, this is safe for sensitive skin. Although it has deep cleansing properties, the exfoliating nature of this product is still gentle enough for sensitive skin. It does not contain any common allergens.

Is this product good for normal skin?
If you have normal skin, you can still benefit from exfoliating with this product, but you may wish to use it only once a week or as tolerated.

settings.title: Benefits
settings.tab_content:
•  Rejuvenates and softens skin.

•  Cleanses without stripping away any natural oils.

•  Hydrates and helps to smooth out any dry patches and fine lines.

Follow Dr. Throwers' recommended skincare regime for dry skin:

Morning

Step 1- Cleanser
Gently rinse your face with warm water, then apply Step 1 Dry Skin Facial Cleanser. Massage it into your skin, being careful not to get it in your eyes or mouth. Rinse your face with warm water and pat dry.

settings.title: FAQ
settings.tab_content:
Is this good for acne-prone skin?
Yes. Although acne is typically associated with oily skin, it can also occur on dry skin, for different reasons. Dr. Thrower's Dry Skin Facial Cleanser is perfect for combating acne and blemishes by cleansing any dirt or dead skin cells, without drying your skin out any further.

Is this skin kit good for sensitive skin?
Yes, all of the products in the Dry Skin Kit are gentle enough to be used on any skin TYPE.

Are these products safe to use on eczema-prone skin?
Yes, you can use these products if you are prone to dry skin and eczema breakouts. If you are worried, we recommend that you test the products on a small patch of skin first to see if you experience any issues.

settings.title: Benefits
settings.tab_content:
•  Thoroughly exfoliates dead skin cells.

•  Helps to reduce signs of skin discoloration and blemishes.

•  Hydrates and controls production of sebum.

settings.tab_content:
At night, wash your face normally with a dry skin facial cleanser or normal/combination facial cleanser. When it is clean and still wet, gently begin to apply the facial scrub, massaging in small circular motions. Rinse it off with warm water, and pat your face dry. Apply Aloe Facial Moisturizing Cream. and continue with your nightly skincare routine. Use this product twice a week, or as needed.

This scrub is a part of Skin Care Routine:  

Morning

Step 1- Normal/Combination Skin Facial Cleanser.

Step 2- Normal/Combination Skin Facial Toner.

Step 3- SPF 30 Face & Body Moisturizing Lotion.

Nighttime

Step 1-Normal/Combination Facial Cleanser.

Scrub or Mask
Use the Normal/Combination Facial Scrub or the Normal/Dry Skin Facial Mask twice a week at night, as needed. Make sure you don’t use these on the same day.

Step 2- Normal/Combination Skin Facial Toner.

Step 3- Aloe Facial Moisturizing Cream.

For the best results, use this facial scrub in conjunction with other products that are skin type specific for a skincare routine that gives your skin all of the care that it needs.

settings.title: FAQ
settings.tab_content:
How often should I use this product?
It is recommended that you use this product twice a week. Normal Combination skin exfoliate every day, and you may find that you only need to use it once a week, or as your skin needs it.

Is it designed for people with oily skin?
This product can be used by people with oily skin, but it is designed for people with normal or combination skin - some parts of your face may be oily, while others might be dry. It helps to regulate excessive oil production, while still providing moisture to dry areas. If you have really oily skin, you may prefer the Oily Skin Facial Scrub.

settings.title: How To Use
settings.tab_content:
Follow skincare regime for a lighter, more even skin tone:

1. Apply Perfect Tone Cream on areas that you want to lighten or minimize impurities. This product is safe to use on your face and body. Apply this every morning and night.

2. Apply Skin Lightening Moisturizing Lotion every morning and night for an even skin tone and overall skin nourishment.

3. For specific areas that you want to target more closely, use Dark Spot Fade Treatment twice a day. Apply a small amount to a cotton applicator and target the center of the dark spots. Do not rub in, or rub around the dark spot.

4. Take one glutathione capsule twice a day (one in the morning and one at night).

settings.title: FAQ

What is Glutathione?
Glutathione is a naturally-occurring antioxidant that the body produces. It helps to repair damage at the cellular level, fixing uneven skin tones and reducing the appearance of scars.

How often should I be applying these products?
It is safe to apply these products to your skin daily, with no issues. You should also take two glutathione tablets a day.

How long should I use these products before I see results ?Your results are going to vary based on a number of factors, including your skin type and discoloration. Some people see results as early as three days after beginning this regime. If you do not see any results after five months, it is recommended that you stop using these products.

settings.title: FAQ
settings.tab_content:
Is this product good for sensitive skin?
Yes, this product can be used on sensitive skin. If you are concerned, test it on a small patch of skin before applying it to your whole body. If you experience any redness or irritation, do not continue using it.

Can this be used as an everyday moisturizer?
Yes, its nourishing properties make this a great daily moisturizer for all over your body, especially for those with dry skin.

settings.title: Benefits
settings.tab_content:
• Helps to regrow hair lost due to genetic balding.

• Helps to reverse hair loss caused by scalp damage.

• Contains natural ingredients that nourish and protect the existing hair.

Warning
For External use Only. Do not use if:
• You are under 18 years of age. Do not use on babies and children.

• Your scalp is red, inflamed, infected, irritated, or painful.

• Using other medicines on the scalp. Ask a Doctor before use if you have heart disease.

• Do not apply on other parts of the body.

• Avoid contact with the eyes. In case of accidental contact, rinse eyes with large amounts of cool tap water.

• Some people have experienced changes in hair color and/or texture.

Stop use and ask a Doctor if:
• Chest pain, rapid heartbeat, faintness, or dizziness occurs.

• Sudden, unexplained weight gain occurs.

• Your hands or feet swell.

• Scalp irritation or redness occurs.

• Unwanted facial hair growth occurs.

• You do not see hair regrowth in eight months.

• Keep out of reach of children. If swallowed, get medical help or contact a Poison Control Center right away.

settings.title: How To Use
settings.tab_content:
• Apply the product to the areas of the scalp that are experiencing hair loss. Gently massage it into the affected area twice a day.

• For the best results, apply this product after you have used Dr. Throwers' shampoo and conditioner. Only use Thro-Grower after you have washed your hair (not before), letting it sit on the scalp for as long as possible.

• Use for at least 3-4 months to see results.

settings.title: Ingredients
settings.tab_content: The active ingredient in this product is Minoxidil. This is an FDA-approved ingredient that helps to restore hair follicles at the cellular level, stimulating new hair growth. It also contains Redensyl, which is known for its regenerative properties, especially when it is used in conjunction with Minoxidil.

settings.title: FAQ
settings.tab_content:
Can this product be used to prevent hair loss?
No, there is no evidence to indicate that this product can prevent hair loss - it is only helpful if the hair loss has already occurred. 

Who should NOT use Thro-Grower?
Thro-Grower is not indicated for anyone with existing scalp irritation. You should ask your doctor if you are unsure of the cause of your hair loss.

When should I start seeing results?
You should start to see results around four to six months after you start regularly using Thro-Grower. This is because hair only grows around half an inch per month, so it will take a little time to see the desired result. 

What happens if I completely stop using Thro-Grower? Will I keep the new hair?
Continuous use of Thro-Grower is needed to maintain hair regrowth. If you stop using Thro-Grower, the normal hair loss process will start again. You will probably lose your newly regrown hair in four to six months.

What if I miss a dose or forget to use Thro-Grower?
If you miss one or two daily doses of Thro-Grower, just continue with your next dose. You should not make up for missed doses.

Can I use Thro-Grower more than two times a day? Will it work faster, better?
No. Thro-Grower will not work faster or better if used more than two times a day. More frequent use or larger doses have not been shown to speed up hair growth.

What are the most common side effects with Thro-Grower?
The most common side effects come from overuse. More frequent use or larger doses have not been shown to speed up hair growth and may increase your chances of side effects, such as scalp irritation, frequent headaches, increased heart rate, and an increase in unwanted facial hair.

Can I use hair spray, mousse, conditioner, gel, etc.?
Yes. There is no reason to change your usual hair care routine when using Thro-Grower. However, you should apply Thro-Grower after applying your styling aids.

Can I have my hair colored, permed or use relaxers while using Thro-Grower?
Yes. We have no information that these treatments change the effect of Thro-Grower. Re-apply one day after chemical service.

Can I apply Thro-Grower and wash my hair an hour later?
No. For Thro-Grower to work best, you should allow the product to remain on the scalp for a minimum of four hours before washing.

Can I swim, exercise (sweat) or go out in the rain?
Yes. If possible, apply Thro-Grower to a dry scalp after swimming or exercising or wait about four hours after application before going swimming or exercising.

What is glutathione?
Glutathione is a naturally-occurring antioxidant that the body produces. It helps to stimulate skin cells, lightening skin tone and minimizing hyperpigmentation, reducing the appearance of acne scars and stretch marks, as well as giving skin a more youthful appearance. 

How Does GSH Work?
GSH removes toxins and abnormal cells that may cause medical conditions and cancer from the body. GSH helps prevent skin damage and aging. It has also been shown to improve brain function.

How quickly should I see results?
Most people see results within 4 to 6 months of starting the treatment.

Where is it manufactured?
Our GSH, like all of our products, are manufactured in the USA, FDA approved, certificate of analysis, sterility tested, potency tested, concentration tested, skin reactivity tested, and USP grade. All of our products are subject to regulatory testing and validation to ensure the consistency and purity of each capsule.

Rinse your face with warm water and pat dry. Repeat this step every morning and evening, before continuing with the rest of your skincare regime designed for dry skin.

settings.title: FAQ
settings.tab_content:
Is this product safe to use on sensitive skin?
Yes, this product can be used on sensitive skin. If you are concerned about a possible skin reaction, we recommend that you first try it on a small section of your skin. Only continue using it if there is no irritation. 

Is this safe enough to use every day?
Yes, you should be using this product every morning and night. It is gentle and hydrating, so it will not dry out your face any further.

settings.title: Benefits
settings.tab_content:
• Reduces the presence of large pores

• Helps to reduce the excessive production of oil

• Helps to get rid of unwanted bumps and blemishes

Warning: FOR EXTERNAL USE ONLY. AVOID CONTACT WITH EYE AREAS, CORNER OF NOSE,  AND MOUTH AREAS. If irritation occurs, or if you are experiencing burning, stinging, excessive peeling and/or darkening of the skin, discontinue use and contact a physician. Do not use on children under 12 years of age unless directed by a physician. KEEP THIS AND ALL DRUGS OUT OF REACH OF CHILDREN. If swallowed, get medical help or contact a Poison Control Center right away.

settings.title: How To Use
settings.tab_content:
• If you are using this product in the morning or evening as part of your regular skincare regime, apply this product after you have used Dr. Thrower’s Oily Skin Facial Cleanser (before you apply moisturizer). 

• You can use it up to 2 times a day. As this product can cause excessive drying, start with one application daily before increasing to two or three times a day as required. 

• Apply some to a cotton ball and gently dab this onto the affected areas - enlarged pores, acne, blemishes, shaving bumps. Avoid the eye area, the corners of the nose and the mouth.

• Once the product has dried, you can continue with the rest of your skincare regime.

settings.title: FAQ
settings.tab_content:
How often should I be using this product?
This astringent is a product that will dry out the skin, so we recommend using it once a day to begin with, and only on problem areas. You can gradually increase your usage as necessary, up to two or three times a day.

settings.title: Benefits
settings.tab_content:
• Helps to lighten dark spots caused by hyperpigmentation or age

• Removes dark spots, creates an even, bright skin tone all over

• Leaves skin, clear, looking healthier and younger

Warning: FOR EXTERNAL USE ONLY. AVOID CONTACT WITH EYE AND MOUTH AREAS. Keep away from fire or open flame. Do not use on children under 12 years of age unless directed by a physician. Some individuals with hay fever, asthma, allergies, or sinus conditions may experience sneezing and coughing as a result of the ingredient sodium metabisulfite. Stop use and contact doctor if you experience burning, stinging, excessive peeling, or darkening of the skin. FOR EXTERNAL USE ONLY. KEEP THIS AND ALL DRUGS OUT OF REACH OF CHILDREN. If swallowed, get medical help or contact a Poison Control Center right away.

• Once you have applied moisturizer or SPF, use a cotton swab to apply the product directly into the center of your dark spot. Let it air dry on your skin.

• Use this product twice a day (morning and night) or as directed by your physician.

settings.title: FAQ
settings.tab_content:
Is this safe to use on my face?
Yes, this product is safe to use on your face. Avoid using it near your eyes or mouth.

Will it help to fade age spots?
Yes, the Dark Spot Fade Treatment Solution can work on dark age spots and provide your skin with a more youthful appearance.

Is this safe to use on large areas of skin?
This product is only designed to be used on small areas of skin. If you want to lighten or even out larger patches of skin, we recommend trying Dr. Thrower’s Skin Lightening Moisturizer.

settings.title: Ingredients
settings.tab_content:
Action Ingredients
Tranexamic acid: a powerful ingredient that brightens skin complexion and improves the appearance of discoloration.
Niacinamide: water soluble vitamin B3 improves the skin barrier and helps reduce signs of past damage.
Kojic acid: lightens visible sun damage, age spots or scars. Also has antimicrobial properties. 
Ferulic acid: skin antioxidant that protects skin integrity by reducing the development of fine lines, spots, and wrinkles.
Rose hip seed oil: rich in vitamin A to reduce hyperpigmentation. Boosts collagen production and reduces fine lines. 
Turmeric root extract: powerful antioxidant that leaves a visible skin glow.
Hyaluronic acid: humectant, helps the skin hold on to water.
Vitamin E: provides a natural barrier to keep moisture in your skin. 

Ingredient Listing
Water, Butylene Glycol, Behenyl Alcohol, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Rosa
Canina (Rose hip) Seed Oil, Glyceryl Stearate, Tranexamic Acid, Simmondsia Chinensis
(Jojoba) Seed Oil, Kojic Acid, Polycitronellol Acetate, Glycerin, Salicylic Acid, Morus Alba
(Mulberry) Root Extract, Niacinamide, Glycyrrhiza Glabra (Licorice) Root Extract, Salix Alba
(Willow) Bark Extract, Polyglyceryl-3 Stearate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Caprylate,
Sodium Hyaluronate, Curcuma Longa (Turmeric) Root Extract, Inositol, Ferulic Acid,
Panthenol, Lactic Acid, Hyaluronic Acid, Glycolic Acid, Ceramide EOP, Ceramide NS,
Ceramide NP, Ceramide AS, Ceramide AP, Retinol, Cholesterol, Sucrose Distearate,
Propylene Glycol, Xanthan Gum, Polydextrose, Tocopheryl Acetate, Disodium EDTA,
Dextrin, Amylopectin, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin

settings.title: How To Use
settings.tab_content:
Because of the combination of action ingredients begin by applying a very small, thin layer, quantity to your intimate area every other night for sensitivity test.

If there is no burning, itching, stinging, or irritation you can increase the frequency of use (make sure to continue to use a thin layer).

Some burning and stinging is normal on the initial application, but should subside quickly.

If symptoms persist rinse thoroughly with water and discontinue for a couple of days. Reapply along with our SOOTHING BODY CREAMY OINTMENT as a base to hydrate skin before application in those treated areas.

This product can also be used as an anti-aging facial cream because of its strong exfoliating properties. 

Apply a VERY thin layer to the entire face after using your night time skin type specific regimen.

This is a very potent formula that will give great results must be used with caution using large amounts may accelerate burning, itching, stinging, and irritation leading to a lack of skin tolerance.
